question: Analyze the social media engagement metrics for companies in the technology industry over the last year, focusing on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram.

subtasks.task: Identify all companies in the technology industry from the CompanyInfo table.
Gather Facebook engagement metrics (likes, comments, engagement rate) from the CompanyFacebookDetail table for the identified companies.
Collect Twitter engagement data (likes, reposts) from the CompanyTwitterDetail table for the identified companies.
Extract Instagram engagement metrics (likes, comments, engagement rate) from the CompanyInstagramDetail table for the identified companies.
Consolidate and summarize all engagement metrics for analysis, comparing performance across the three platforms over the last year.
